abstract: Parliamentary oversight panel calls for Britain's spy agencies to overhaul surveillance laws governing monitoring of private communications.
lead_paragraph: The parliamentary investigation also concluded that laws under which the agencies monitored communications were complex and lacked transparency.

headline.main: British Inquiry Calls for Overhaul of Surveillance Laws but Clears Spy Agencies
headline.print_headline: Britain: Panel Calls for Transparency as Intelligence Agencies Collect Data

snippet: The parliamentary investigation also concluded that laws under which the agencies monitored communications were complex and lacked transparency.
